query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `incidents` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `machineId` int NOT NULL,
  `incidentType` enum('offline','malfunction','low_stock','temperature_alert','payment_error') NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('open','in_progress','resolved','closed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'open',
  `severity` enum('low','medium','high','critical') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'medium',
  `description` text,
  `detectedAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `assignedTo` int,
  `resolvedAt` timestamp NULL,
  `resolutionNotes` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FfdjCLoumdFxBM.root --database CnvwHcg9Gg9M7uweMepDrE --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `incidents` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `machineId` int NOT NULL,
  `incidentType` enum('offline','malfunction','low_stock','temperature_alert','payment_error') NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('open','in_progress','resolved','closed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'open',
  `severity` enum('low','medium','high','critical') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'medium',
  `description` text,
  `detectedAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `assignedTo` int,
  `resolvedAt` timestamp NULL,
  `resolutionNotes` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
